title: Champion having late response to my commands
body: This just started happening last night and I don't know what to do, I will click for my Champion to move somewhere and It takes them about  5 seconds to respond to it, it's just a late response to everything really. My connection is fine everything else works.. Btw it takes a long time to login as well and then when i'm logged in sometimes for the news section i get a thing that says something like "please retry news is down" or something like that and i can't lock in my champion until like 5 seconds before the timer runs out!! I have contacted Support but I haven't gotten anything yet and i'd really like to know if anyone else has had this problem! Thank you!!! - Karley :)

replies.body:
What you're describing are fairly common symptoms of *Packet loss*, which occurs if your connection to our servers is *poor or unstable*. I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure you aren't running any conflicting network settings locally.

Let me know if this helped.
